rules_text:
Incarnate {2}{W}{B} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Return up to one target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Lifelink
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
